text: In my opinion ambition is what's in your heart, and my ambition is to work for education;
is to see every child going to school, getting an education and that is my ambition.
That is what my heart tells me.
When I was in Swat I had faced a time when girls were deprived of education
and at that time I realized that there are some people, terrorists, that are afraid of the power of women
and that is why they are not letting girls get an education
and I think that education is necessary for the empowerment of women and for the empowerment of girls in the future.
I want to see a world where every child goes to school, where every child gets education.

This is my dream and this is
what I want to see in my future.
But for that purpose, to achieve this goal I think we have to work hard.
